text:
24-7
You have killed my love.
You used to stir my imagination: Now you don t even stir my curiosity.
You simply produce no effeet.
I loved you because you were marvellous, because you had genius and intellect , because you realised the dreams of great and gave shape and substance to the shadows of art.
You have thrown it all away:
You are shallow and stupid
You Ave killed ai tove .
